content: this pretty and simple snowflake makes the perfect decoration hang them on a garland or mobile or tree and they are sure to brighten the room this pattern calls for any worsted weight yarn and e 3 5 mm crochet hook you can also go smaller and make small snowflakes with smaller hook and yarn thank you for your purchase if you are more of a visual learner you can also see my youtube tutorial on how to make it https //youtu be/vihl9z9jtwk
